it heavy for me to say but the game isn't the same as it used to be, for myself who's been playing since CS 1.0 (throw back a decade and a bit), the current CSGO for rank/competitive is filled with trolls, derankers, stacks that kick solo random and people who can't handle pressure when losing at round 5 in the game and goes afk. Disappointing.
